data.text: @lizgoingon Ha I hear you!You have to pre order the right variant though . Not the variant where you can’t get out of bed sats drop to 93 need steroids and inhalers and still can’t run 6 weeks later then the kids get again & you have to homeschool next week again and want to jump off cliff!
@liztebb Haha! I’ll take a week of isolation on my own! Just think of the Netflix….
@lizgoingon Fingers crossed. I’ve escaped it in the household twice so it is possible!
@lizgoingon Oh Liz … Liz Liz LIZ! It’s exactly the same rule as saying the word bbq in the British summer . Then it rains . Liz Liz Liz !! X
@lizgoingon Oh yeah, that’s a shout; the universes way of thanking you for being a rock star!
@clare_jeffs I wonder if I get chronic exposure at work which keeps my immunity topped up….

@lizgoingon Fab news! You might just be one of those people who doesn’t get it now. My cousin (in a v small house with no way to avoid each other) didn’t catch it from her fella. Fingers crossed for you. Hope hubby is okay x
